channel.title: 空投 on 哈希说
channel.description: Recent content in 空投 on 哈希说

item.title: 订阅入口
item.description: Written in Go, Hugo is an open source static site generator available under the Apache License 2.0. Hugo supports TOML, YAML and JSON data file types, Markdown and HTML content files and uses shortcodes to add rich content. Other notable features are taxonomies, multilingual mode, image processing, custom output formats, HTML/CSS/JS minification and support for Sass SCSS workflows.
